DOC.brief_summary: This observational study ass predictor early on-treatment sustained virological response treatment-naïve patient chronic hepatitis C initiate treatment Pegasys ( peginterferon alfa-2a ) peginterferon alfa-2b ribavirin . Data collect treatment period ( 24 48 week ) 12 24 week end treatment . Target sample size < 2000 .
DOC.brief_title: PROPHESYS 2 : An Observational Study Predictors Response Treatment-naïve Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C Treated With Pegasys ( Peginterferon Alfa-2a ) Peginterferon-alfa-2b
DOC.criteria: adult patient , > /= 18 year age chronic hepatitis C inform consent data collection coinfection HIV HBV previous treatment peginterferon and/or ribavirin
